Name: Avani
About the game: Avani, our furry protagonist, finds an ancient sword in the forest. By accident, they broke its seal, freeing the vile being that it was imprisoning. Join them in this action-adventure game where you will explore this corrupted land, fight the evil that hides within and cleanse it from the spirit before it destroys the world. Isometric-style art and enemy attacks. Three stages: Forest, Fire, Ice! Featured digital art cinematics in-game Enjoy the visually calm feeling of the forest, and then the contrast of the evil's power destruction. Languages: English, Spanish, Basque, Catalan, Galego, German Avani is a project developed by Kyuut Katz, a team of 2nd Year students at DigiPen Institute of Technology Europe - Bilbao in a 9-month development cycle from the ground up using C++ to develop their engine and game.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Avani? Check out the release date (Nov 19, 2022), developer insights from DigiPen Europe-Bilbao, and a complete game summary.
